mapper.select: select description description, rate rate, before_time beforeTime from tbl_refund
mapper.update: update tbl_refund set description=#{description}, rate=#{rate}, before_time=#{beforeTime}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member_strategy (member_name, url, price, rate) values (#{name}, #{url}, #{threshold}, #{rate})
mapper.select: select member_name name, url url, price threshold, rate rate from tbl_member_strategy where id = #{id}
select id id, member_name name, url url, price threshold, rate rate from tbl_member_strategy
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event (startTime, endTime, description, event_name, coupon_id, Expiration) values (#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{description}, #{eventName}, #{couponId}, #{expiration})
insert into tbl_coupon (coupon_name, description, discount, threshold, url) values (#{couponName}, #{description}, #{discount}, #{threshold}, #{url})
mapper.select: select id id, coupon_name couponName, description description, discount discount, threshold threshold, url url from tbl_coupon where threshold <= #{cost}
select id id, startTime startTime, endTime endTime, description description, event_name eventName, coupon_id couponId from tbl_event
select id id, coupon_name couponName, description description, discount discount, threshold threshold, url url from tbl_coupon where id = #{couponId}
select id id, startTime startTime, endTime endTime, description description, event_name eventName, coupon_id couponId from tbl_event where id = #{eventId}
